code: import React from'react';import{useNews}from'./../context/NewsContext';import'./css/NewsTab.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const NewsComponent=()=>{const{articles,loading}=useNews();if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{padding:'20px'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading News..."})});}if(!articles||articles.length===0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{padding:'20px'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No articles at the moment."})});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"news-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"news-grid",children:articles.map((article,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"news-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:article.image,alt:article.title,className:"news-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"news-heading",children:article.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"news-meta",children:[article.source.name," \u2022 ",new Date(article.publishedAt).toLocaleString()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"news-description",children:article.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:article.url,target:"_blank",rel:"noreferrer",className:"news-link",children:"Read more \u2192"})]},index))})});};export default NewsComponent;
